content: leg warmers by jane richmond finished measurements 7 5 inch circumference unstretched x 14 25 inches long pattern notes these simple legwarmers are designed to use up every last inch of one skein of cascade 220 if you prefer not to unravel your swatch you will need to purchase an additional skein directions make 2 using long tail method co 48 sts join being careful not to twist round 1 k2 p2 to end of round repeat round 1 until piece measures 14 inches long bobble loosely in rib weave in ends to watch a video tutorial on the magic loop method visit materials janerichmond blogspot com/p/tutorials html  100g skein of cascade yarns heathers 220 shown in colour 9408 220yds  5 mm dpns or long circular needle for magic loop abbreviations method  yarn needle bobble bind off co cast on gauge dpns double pointed needles k knit 18 sts and 24 row = 4 in over st st p purl round round sizes sts stitches st st stockinette stitch one size janerichmond etsy com © jane richmond 2011 -patterns are for personal use only-
